data.eml:eml: A new species of Geosesarma from Palawan, Philippines (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Sesarmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Manuel-Santos, Marivene R., Yeo, Darren C. J. (2007): A new species of Geosesarma from Palawan, Philippines (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Sesarmidae). Zootaxa 1607: 63-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178816
